<a name="wayaround" id="wayaround" style="color:#000000"><strong>How do I best find my way around the
There are a number of ways to find the information you are looking
for on Knowsley Councils website. Please see options below
At the top of the right hand menu is a keyword search box. If you
type in words or phrases related to the information you are looking
for into this and press ‘GO’ you will be shown a list
of links to relevant pages on the website.
The advanced search page offers a selection of specific keyword
search boxes which will search a specific area of the main council
website or a council related website. For example to search for
business advice you should type the relevant word or phra se into
the knowsleybusiness.com search box. A search will be performed on
the knowsleybusiness.com website only as appose to the entire
Please click on the appropriate letter in the list of letters and a
list of all services beginning with that letter will appear. Please
note - where a letter is not a link this indicates that no services
are listed for that letter at present
The global navigation can be found in the left column of council
web pages. This is also the top level of main site navigation. When
a global navigation item is selected all related sub-links should
appear in the middle column (level two navigation) an d when a
selection is made from the middle column
straight to the relevant information or you will be taken to a
Once you arrive at the information page
need will either be presented on a single page or broken up across

column2: which can be navigated using next and previous

column1: links found at the bottom of the page
Additional content relating broadly to the topic or service you
have chosen will be accessible via links in the right hand menu and
additional information which relates specifically to the topic or
service you have chosen will be accessible via boxes i n the middle
The middle column displays the breadcrumb trail. The breadcrumb
trail is a navigation aid that shows you where you are on the
website and allows you to quickly access upper levels of the
The sitemap is a list all links within the website
You can contact Knowsley council with general or specific
enquiries. Use the contact us link found in the header of all
To contact key departments/services in Knowsley council with a
specific enquiry use the ‘Who to Contact’ boxes found
on all council information pages. You can contact a specific
council department / service provider by telephone
Website feedback can be given by emailing corporatewebteam@knowsley.gov.uk.

column1: 'Preferences'. In the dialogue box type: http://www.knowsley.gov.uk in
the 'address' field of the home page zone. Check that the

that simply click on OK and when you launch your browser
open on the Knowsley Council web site.
